Paneer Butter Masala

Paneer dish traditionally served with Naan

Ingredients

  • 1 tablespoon oil
  • 2 green cardamoms
  • 1 cup onions
  • 1 1/2 cup tomatoes
  • 3/4 teaspoon salt
  • 3/4 teaspoon sugar
  • 12-14 cashews
  • 1 teaspoon red chili powder
  • 3/4 teaspoon garam masala
  • 1 1/4 tablespoon butter
  • Giner garlic paste
  • 200 grams panner
  • 3 tablespoons cream

Preparation

  1. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in pan
  2. Add 1 cup onions and stir often
  3. Add 1 1/2 cup tomatoes and salt
  4. Cook until onions and tomatoes are soft
  5. Add 3/4 teaspoon garam masala, 12 cashews, and red chili powder
  6. Fry for 2-3 minutes
  7. Transfer to blender with 1 cup water
  8. Add 1 1/2 tablespoon butter to a pan
  9. Add in garlic and giner and stir for 1 minute
  10. Pour the blended puree into the pan, add water, and mix
  11. Add paneer to pan and cook for 3 minutes
  12. And cream and mix well
  13. Enjoy!
